message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the price. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $11,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is still a great deal for you, as the product is worth $10,000 to you. Let's make this happen!

Alice, I understand your position, but $10,500 is still a bit outside my comfort zone. I'm willing to go up to $10,000 for the product. This is a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're willing to accept.
